cards.excerpt: Today's Internet is highly inefficient, unsustainable, exploits user data, and is extremely centralized. ThreeFold started from scratch, and built the Internet infrastructure the worlds need for exponential evolution.

cards.title: A model in which anyone can partake

cards.excerpt: Enabling a simple way for anyone to partake in the Internet economy. All you need to get started is a node, plug it into an electricity outlet, and to connect it to your network coverage.

cards.title: The most powerful nodes

cards.excerpt: Get your 3Node now to connect compute and storage capacity on the edge. Our lightwieght & autonomous operating system empowers the builders of the Internet with more freedom, performance & sustainability.
